summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5638 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 14, Woodlawn Terrace Addition, being the alley between North 50th Street and North 51st Street, from Greenwood Avenue to 1st Avenue Northwest; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 74352, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
